subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Hawkeyes, one of the tallest N.C.A.A. teams, held Davidson — which normally scores 40 percent of its points from behind the arc — to 21.4 percent on 3-point shots.
snippet: The Hawkeyes, one of the tallest N.C.A.A. teams, held Davidson — which normally scores 40 percent of its points from behind the arc — to 21.4 percent on 3-point shots.
